parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-b | Noun - feminine singular construct
Preposition-l | Verb - Qal - Infinitive construct | third person masculine singular
str2: To reign, inceptively, to ascend the throne, to induct into royalty, to take counsel

parse: Verb - Qal - Perfect - third person masculine singular
Preposition-l | Noun - masculine plural construct | third person masculine singular
str2: Chieftain, chief, ruler, official, captain, prince
Benhail -- 'son of might', one of Jehoshaphat's leaders

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-l | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Obadiah -- 'servant of Yah', the name of a number of Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-l | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Zachariah -- the name of a number of Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-l | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Nethanel -- 'given of God', the name of a number of Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw, Preposition-l | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Micaiah -- 'Who is like Yah?' an Israelite, also an Israelite woman
Judah -- 'praised', a son of Jacob, also the southern kingdom, also four Israelites
